name: Oranguru
description: Known for its extreme intelligence, this Pokémon will look down on inexperienced Trainers, so it’s best suited to veteran Trainers.

abilities.name: Telepathy
abilities.effect: This Pokémon does not take damage from friendly Pokémon's moves, including single-target moves aimed at it.
abilities.description: Anticipates an ally’s attack and dodges it.

abilities.name: Symbiosis
abilities.effect: Passes the bearer's held item to an ally when the ally uses up its item.
abilities.description: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
